venue.name: Rolling Ridge Retreat and Conference Center

item.description:
Enneagram and Relationship Dynamics 9:30-3:30


Learn how the types relate to each other, how your subtypes affect your
relationships, how your parents type affects your relationships, how your
relationship history with different types influence your relationships, who you are drawn to and why, what types tend to be a challenge and why, what combination stend to be easier and how to relate well to any type!
There will be a very brief review of the types and subtypes and the day will be spent on ways to have all relationships be more enjoyable using the Enneagram

Andover, MA, www.rollingridge.org, 978 682 8815
Wed Feb 10, 9:30am-3:30pm, $48 by 2/3 - 55 atter
Includes fabulous lunch, acres of land and lake to walk around
Beautiful villa is the meeting area!

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and a leading expert on the Enneagram, with close to 20 years experience teaching. He is a psychotherapist, personal coach, workshop leader, organizational trainer. He is writing his second book on Herb's Tips for Living.
item.name: Enneagram and Relationship Dynamics, 9:30-3:30
